channel.title: Loop timer
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Loop timer"

item.title: Re: Loop timer
item.content:encoded:
False alarm… everything is fixed now.

Seems permissions were not set correctly, which was slightly odd since it said I had permission to use village bonuses.. hmm

item.title: Re: Loop timer
item.content:encoded:
I know, I see it on my alt, Darkshard, but not on my main Taliesan /sigh

I have submitted a bug report, we shall see what happens.

item.title: Re: Loop timer
item.content:encoded: The Party House button got moved yesterday, it should now be at the top of the options in the Village. However, if it's still not there, I'd suggest submitting a bug report with as much relevant information as you can.

item.title: Loop timer
item.content:encoded:
I am on my 7th day of the count down for my loop timer, and have 7 days left.

The party house is missing from my screen in the village. Are these two things related or is it a bug? I thought all the cut backs happened on day 14 with STA loss and being unable to do things for the village.

It seems I cannot use the potion palace either… looking more and more like it is due to the loop timer. Which is odd since the only thing I read in the message was a 14day lock, nothing about 7days :(
